author: sky.cactus
content: Access list should be an array of tuples.  It isn't directly RLP encoded, but it is part of a larger data structure that is RLP encoded (transaction payload).

author: ryanleeschneider
content: True, my PR might be falsely interpreted as needing to double-encode the access_list, I'll close it.

author: holiman
content: I've added some RPC response examples in this gist: https://gist.github.com/holiman/baf6074b65cbc120b16a1f4c37f65ebe . Other devs maybe can do the same calls on their clients (same txhash on yolov3), so we can compare more easily.
